message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your business operations. We understand its value to you is $1200000, and based on its unique features and market position, we're proposing an initial price of $1400000. This offer aims to provide a fair balance between our valuation and your perceived worth of the product. We're confident this price will be attractive to you while ensuring a profitable transaction for us. Please let us know if you'd like to discuss further or if you have any concerns.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
